title: How to Make Fabric Flower Hair Clips Tied with Ribbons

steps.headline: Make a petal.
steps.description: Cut out a piece of cotton cloth in a rectangle shape; fold it in half. Sew a 'U' shape along the edges of the cloth as the picture shows.

steps.headline: Make flower shapes.
steps.description: String the thread to make a petal, and then make another four petals linked with the first one. Sew both ends and adjust a shape of flower. Do the same to make the other flower with three petals.

steps.headline: Embellish the flower.
steps.description: Glue the small flower on the large one; stick a plastic pearl button in the middle of the flowers.

steps.headline: Fold a ribbon bow.
steps.description: Fold a bow with a strip of ribbon as the picture shows. Glue it to fix the shape.

steps.headline: Finish the flower.
steps.description: Cross a pink ribbon to make a circle. Stick the ribbon bow and the pink ribbon down the flower. Stick the pink one at the bottom. Glue a piece of round cloth at the back of the pink ribbon.

steps.headline: Glue a strip of white ribbon around the hair clip to make it more beautiful.

text: Make a petal. Cut out a piece of cotton cloth in a rectangle shape; fold it in half. Sew a 'U' shape along the edges of the cloth as the picture shows. Make flower shapes. String the thread to make a petal, and then make another four petals linked with the first one. Sew both ends and adjust a shape of flower. Do the same to make the other flower with three petals. Embellish the flower. Glue the small flower on the large one; stick a plastic pearl button in the middle of the flowers. Fold a ribbon bow. Fold a bow with a strip of ribbon as the picture shows. Glue it to fix the shape. Finish the flower. Cross a pink ribbon to make a circle. Stick the ribbon bow and the pink ribbon down the flower. Stick the pink one at the bottom. Glue a piece of round cloth at the back of the pink ribbon. Glue a strip of white ribbon around the hair clip to make it more beautiful. Stick the flower on it. Finished.
